hero.headline: Spaces that honour how we live
hero.body: Since 2009, Maison Aurelia has pursued a singular vision: to create furniture of enduring beauty that transforms houses into homes of meaning and character.

philosophy.headline: We believe that the objects we live with shape the quality of every day
paragraphs: Every piece we create begins with a question: how will this object participate in someone's life? Not as decoration, but as a companion to mornings, evenings, and the quiet moments in between.

This conviction guides everything — from the forests where our wood is sourced to the hands that shape each joint. We design for permanence, because beauty that endures is the only kind worth pursuing.

founders.headline: Born from a belief that home is where art and life converge
paragraphs: Maison Aurelia was founded in Lyon by Isabelle and Marc Aurelia — a curator and a cabinetmaker who shared a dissatisfaction with the disposable nature of modern furnishing. They envisioned a maison where design heritage met contemporary living.
What began as a small atelier producing bespoke dining tables has grown into a global design house, yet the founding principle remains unchanged: every piece must earn its place in your home.
founders.imageAlt: Elegantly appointed interior with warm natural light

values.headline: Six principles that shape everything we make

items.title: Permanence Over Trend
items.body: We design pieces that outlive the seasons. Every proportion, every material choice is tested against the question: will this still feel right in thirty years?

items.title: Material Integrity
items.body: We source only what we can trace. Our hardwoods come from managed forests, our leathers from heritage tanneries, our textiles from artisan mills across Europe.

items.title: Human Craft
items.body: Machines shape. Hands refine. Every piece passes through the hands of master artisans who bring decades of intuition to the final finish.

items.title: Restrained Design
items.body: We believe in the power of what is left out. Our designs are defined by restraint — clean lines, honest joinery, and a refusal to over-embellish.

items.title: Environmental Stewardship
items.body: Sustainability is not a programme — it is a design constraint. We use reclaimed materials where possible and design for disassembly and repair.

items.title: Personal Service
items.body: Furnishing a home is intimate work. Our designers consult closely with every client, ensuring each space reflects their individual story.

atelier.headline: Where tradition meets precision
atelier.body: Our Lyon atelier houses forty artisans across woodworking, upholstery, and finishing. Each discipline works in concert — ensuring that when a piece leaves our workshop, it carries the full weight of collective mastery.
atelier.imageAlt: Craftsman workshop with tools and timber

items.title: The First Workshop
items.description: Isabelle and Marc open a small atelier in Lyon's Croix-Rousse district, producing bespoke dining tables from reclaimed French oak.

items.title: Salon du Meuble Recognition
items.description: The Belmont Sofa debuts at Paris's Salon du Meuble, earning critical acclaim for its seamless marriage of comfort and sculptural form.

items.title: London Showroom Opens
items.description: Maison Aurelia's first international showroom opens on Kings Road, Chelsea — a 400-square-metre space designed by Studio Liaigre.

items.title: The Sustainability Commitment
items.description: We become the first luxury furniture house to achieve full supply chain traceability, from forest to finished piece.

items.title: New York & Tokyo
items.description: Showrooms open in SoHo and Omotesando, bringing Maison Aurelia's design philosophy to two of the world's most discerning markets.

items.title: The Heritage Collection
items.description: Fifteen years of craft culminate in our most ambitious collection — a 42-piece line that reimagines European furniture archetypes for contemporary living.

materials.headline: We begin where the best materials grow
materials.body: Every piece of timber is hand-selected from sustainably managed forests across France, Scandinavia, and Japan. Our leathers are vegetable-tanned in Italian tanneries that have operated for over a century. Nothing is left to chance.
materials.imageAlt: Close-up of natural wood grain and handcrafted details

cta.headline: Every extraordinary space starts with a conversation
cta.body: Whether you are furnishing a single room or an entire residence, our design team is here to guide you. Every consultation is complimentary and without obligation.
